vuetify-light-sticker.description: Stick them to your car, laptop or favorite mug. They are made from a durable vinyl with a laminate that is weather-proof against rain, sun, wind and snow, and even dishwasher safe.
vuetify-light-sticker.title: Vuetify Light Stickers

black-vuetify-cap.description: An updated classic that won't break the bank! This hat perfectly combines style and function. Acrylic/wool blend . Six-panel construction.
